hymn.title: And they sing a new song

layout.singingstanza: And they sing a new song, say -- ing: You are wor -- thy to take the scroll And to o -- pen its seals, for You were slain and have pur -- chased for God By Your blood men out of ev -- ery tribe and tongue and peo -- ple and na -- tion, Men out of ev -- ery tribe and tongue and peo -- ple and na -- tion And have made them a king -- dom and priests to our God; And they will reign on the earth, And they will reign on the earth. You are wor -- thy, You were slain, You have pur -- chased men for God Out of ev -- ery Tribe and tongue And peo -- ple and na -- tion.

hymn.notes: The chorus and verse 2 can be sung simultaneously.

lyrics.stanza: And they sing a new song, saying: You are worthy to take the scroll And to open its seals, for You were slain and have purchased for God By Your blood men out of every tribe and tongue and people and nation, Men out of every tribe and tongue and people and nation
You are worthy, You were slain, You have purchased men for God Out of every Tribe and tongue And people and nation.
